banner_description: Showcase the best of Knorr Professional products for chicken chop proprietors all over Malaysia with creative visuals, engaging content and a competition to spotlight the best chicken chops in Malaysia.
title: Kickin’ Chicken Chop – Knorr Malaysia Campaign | Light Up 7
description: Spotlighting Knorr Professional as the go-to brand for chicken chop proprietors through compelling social media campaigns & an engaging mouthwatering video.

contents.title: Malaysia's Next Chicken Chop
contents.subtitle: Showcase the best of Knorr Professional products for chicken chop proprietors all over Malaysia with creative visuals, engaging content and a competition to spotlight the best chicken chops in Malaysia.
contents.challenge_result_title: Elevating Flavours One Pack At A Time Together With Knorr Professional
contents.challenge_description: To showcase the top 3 Chicken Chops in Malaysia, our video production team travelled to 3 different states to find these hidden gems. With the 3 shops having their own distinct style, our team had to ensure the shots taken were aesthetically pleasing.
contents.results_description: Successfully crafting a mouthwatering video, we also showcased how Knorr Professional was business owners' go to brand when it comes to making the best chicken chops.
